body:
This is the custom RP I use in normal gameplay and in all my videos. Huge shout-out to Splade for helping me with the pack.

If you want to see the pack (channel): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGQeTra0Mx7ckn_yXT9WY1g 
If you want to see the pack (video): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9FYUhVU-Ta8 


Download: http://www.mediafire.com/download/mhl06t6fbh1c3az/Customized+Faithful.zip

title: RP Release!

replies.body: To be completely honest, this texture pack is just faithful with custom fire and particles :/ However, the things that are edited still look good :)
replies.body_tagged: To be completely honest, this texture pack is just faithful with custom fire and particles :/ However, the things that are edited still look good :)

replies.body: Well it's low fire, different particles, nicer water, lava and day and night sky. So basically it's a Custom faithful for PvP with general look improvements.
replies.body_tagged: Well it's low fire, different particles, nicer water, lava and day and night sky. So basically it's a Custom faithful for PvP with general look improvements.

replies.body: Lol just changing 5 things in a pack doesn't make it yours, you say you've invented a lot of things that you really haven't *cough* *cough* Zig Zag strafe *cough* *cough*. Also the things you've changed aren't your own, they're from other packs.
replies.body_tagged: Lol just changing 5 things in a pack doesn't make it yours, you say you've invented a lot of things that you really haven't *cough* *cough* Zig Zag strafe *cough* *cough*. Also the things you've changed aren't your own, they're from other packs.

replies.body:
A) I made an edit on a combo mixed with zigzag strafing, and you know that.

B) I said it was a faithful edit and never that I owned faithful. 

You also said you could probably no-pot me a short while back and you kinda lost the next 1v1...not that it determines anything. You tend to go overboard with statements as well.

replies.body: Anyways sorry and thanks for shoutout. By the way the no pot thing was just a joke and I even said it was also I won 8-2 today but that shouldn't count because we were both failing with pots today.

replies.body:
Well I never tried to claim it as my own and others have made that mistake before, so no blame. I probs didn't explain well enough. Anyways, I'm not getting into anything. 

It's k and I felt that you did a fair bit and that It wouldn't be fair to leave you out :P
